remarks: The predicate "is a 3-dim lattice volume" in terms of atoms. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2012.)
statement:
islvol5.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
islvol5.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
islvol5.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islvol5.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islvol5.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
islvol2 $p |- ( K e. HL -> ( X e. V <-> ( X e. B /\ E. p e. A E. q e. A E. r e. A E. s e. A ( ( p =/= q /\ -. r .<_ ( p .\/ q ) /\ -. s .<_ ( ( p .\/ q ) .\/ r ) ) /\ X = ( ( ( p .\/ q ) .\/ r ) .\/ s ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p q r s $.
$d .\/ p q r s $.
$d A p q r s $.
$d B p q r s $.
$d K p q r s $.
$d X p q r s $.
